patchNotes.title: Talents changes and hero changes

texts.text: Additional functionality: Hitting a Hero with <vanilla, abilities, basic 0> increases its damage by 0.1%, up to 40%.

general.developerCommentary: The original quest is a long one and i prefer it to be here and controlled instead of a talent. It also opens a slot for a more unique talent and from my perspective it becomes more natural.

texts.text: Root duration reduced from 2 to 1.5 seconds
Traps now have 600 health but can only be damage after armed

general.developerCommentary: Junkrat has a complete, useful and impactful kit. Having safety tools, good poke, good burst ultimates and even with all the only thing that comes to me a toxic trait is the fact he has summon crowd control traps that can't be destroyed, such a complete character has one of the best zoning roots of the games and it's a COMPLETE nightmare for melee user, they should be but not impossible to deal without cleanses.

texts.text: Activate to make your next <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> fire a continuous burst consuming all current charges.

general.developerCommentary: Always felt that Burst Fire was a talent that looked like a QoL

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Junkrat is a fun and complete character BUT the problem lies on how complete he is, for a mage character he has everything on a level that make it a super pick. It's very hard to break that without changing something on core level like making it have mana or changing how one of his skills works. Here i try to control the power of his crowd control mechanics by changing how <basic, abilities, basic, 2>s can be dealt and also making their talents harder to abuse and not make a melee character life truly miserable. Besides that i tried to bring on some new things for the other aspects.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: For each charge remaining on <modified, abilities, basic, 0> Junkrat receives 7.5% increased basic attack damage. If there's no charges remaining receives 15% movement speed

changes.developerCommentary: The only intent here is to make that a more flexible talent based on the situation you want to sticky yourself in and not make it worse with <vanilla, talents, 16, 1>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Junkrat <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> and Basic Attacks stacks powder on enemy heros for 6 seconds, hitting an enemy hero with <modified, abilities, basic, 1> explodes the marks and deals 124 damage for each mark consumed

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make something related to the previous effect but that won't conflict directly on the way the other talents would deal damage. Making it not a DPS or either a POKE talent but rather a burst one that makes sense with the name

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: Want to bring level 4 as a utility level

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Every 60 seconds after using Hearthstone Junkrat will ride his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 100% increased Movement Speed.

changes.developerCommentary: Made it into a weaker version to input it on level 4 as an utility talent, the reason why is because i feel like this talent belong to weaker tiers but as a competitor with other important talents that could change entirely how Junkrat act.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: Making this tier about <modified, abilities, basic, 1>s and bringing to level 4 as a utility tier

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: Bringing it to a <modified, abilities, basic, 1> talent tier

changes.name: NEW: More Powder!

texts.text: Enemies that are affected by <modified, abilities, basic, 2> and <modified, abilities, basic, 1> within 2 seconds one from the other take 6% maximum health damage
subtexts: If an enemy is affected by 2 <modified, abilities, basic, 2>s and one <modified, abilities, basic, 1> within 2 seconds it will only proc one time. It will work similar to a mark that is consumed when done right with 1 only mark being able to be active at the time

changes.developerCommentary: Bringing an offensive option for the <modified, abilities, basic, 1> talent tier that suits very well the situation that makes every tank wants to ban Junkrat. The famous trap mine combo.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: Changing it to the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> talent tier

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 3>

texts.text: Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> can't be destroyed anymore

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes on <modified, abilities, basic, 2> this seems a perfect opportunity to increase this talent value differently from the other.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: Bringing it to this level so you need to make a choice on how you want to upgrade your <modified, abilities, basic, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: Level 13 will become a <modified, abilities, basic, 2> talent level.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: Made into a QoL change for <modified, abilities, basic, 0>.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: I honestly think with some of the changes made it can be a contender on level 16 it just need to be numeric adjusted if necessary.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: If <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> kills a enemy hero with the explosion after 0.5 seconds Junkrat will launch himself in the air and after 3.75 seconds perform another explosion
subtexts: This can be reseted any number of times on one go

changes.developerCommentary: I would argue that <vanilla, talents, 20, 1> is one of the few times a hero can perform their two ultimates BUT this doesn't necessarily mean it's worth it. What i want to bring here is make it worth it not necessarily by being strong but being hehehe junkrat goes BOOM

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Reduces <modified, abilities, basic, 1> cooldown to 5 seconds, holds 3 charges and enemies will be knocked back 35% further. Enable Junkrat to have 3 concussion mines at the same time.
subtexts: Cooldown between charges will be 0.5 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: I was thinkering on how i could enable Junkrat to perform the double concussion he is able on Overwatch game but also doesn't make it a rip-off of <vanilla, talents, 13, 1> and that was the pog solution i came, it's simple but gets the same result and lets the players perform more.
